overview.summary: View a slice of face-centered data

description.p: This module is specifically for use on face centered data. A simple axis aligned slice through the data. The face values are then mapped to the color. Each face is represented as a line running along the data cell face. You can control line thickness with the line slider at the bottom. The "+" and "-" buttons move the slice one index value along the stated axis. The "Find" button relocate the slice in the center of the data showing the labeled plane.
